titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Office of the President
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Office of the President FA1662

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-02-17 11:15:40 -0500.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Office of the President

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Professional papers of Ford Foundation presidents.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by executive. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
